name: Start of Work
effects:
Gain access to following skills for 3 turns:
Brute Smith (504230)
Anti-Mech Smith (504240)
Stone Break Smith (504250)
Exorcist Smith (504260)

name: Start of Work
作業開始
작업 개시
Début du travail
Beginn der Arbeit
Timbre del comienzo
desc_short: Enable brute smith, anti-mech smith, stone break smith, and exorcist smith for three turns
3回合內可以使用「震獸鍛冶法」「機壞鍛冶法」「岩碎鍛冶法」「除靈鍛冶法」
3턴 동안 '진수 대장술', '기괴 대장술', '암쇄 대장술', '제령 대장술' 사용 가능
Permet d'utiliser Forgeron brutal, Forgeron antiméca,  Forgeron brise-roc et Forgeron exorciste pendant trois tours
Ermöglicht Grobschmied, Anti-Mech-Schmied, Steinbrechschmied und Exorzistschmied für drei Runden.
Aprende Herrero bruto, Herrero antimec, Herrero rompepiedras y Herrero exorcista durante 3 turnos
desc_long: Enables brute smith, anti-mech smith, stone break smith, and exorcist smith for three turns.
3回合內可以使用「震獸鍛冶法」「機壞鍛冶法」「岩碎鍛冶法」「除靈鍛冶法」。
3턴 동안 '진수 대장술', '기괴 대장술', '암쇄 대장술', '제령 대장술'을 사용할 수 있게 됩니다.
Permet d'utiliser Forgeron brutal, Forgeron antiméca,  Forgeron brise-roc et Forgeron exorciste pendant trois tours.
Ermöglicht Grobschmied, Anti-Mech-Schmied, Steinbrechschmied und Exorzistschmied für drei Runden.
Aprende Herrero bruto, Herrero antimec, Herrero rompepiedras y Herrero exorcista durante tres turnos.
